Sorry everyone for late answers, but here you go:

Viktor, yes, you unpack the Dlc's one by one and copy paste / overwrite, and be sure to copy paste them in the right order!

Bcabrcm: Just install the regular game, then copy paste the content from each Dlc in the right order and overwrite the files over and over, that's it.

Boneblade: The installer should work just fine, and the description is in Swedish, explaining what i wrote in the comment before this.
For online gaming you can use Gameranger or similar programs (thats what I have done)...
